# PR #22: More tweaks

Added Claude skills, fixed projects, etc...

## Comments

### Comment by @wclaytor - 2025-12-14 20:33:31

## üêõ Bug Fix: alpine-markdown-presentation Sample Loading

Fixed an issue where the sample presentation file wouldn't load on GitHub Pages (though it worked in Codespaces).

### Root Cause
Service workers were using incorrect paths:
- ‚ùå Absolute paths like `/sample-presentation.md` 
- ‚ùå Wrong filename (`sample-presentation.md` vs `presentation-sample.md`)
- ‚ùå Wrong HTML reference (`/presentation-viewer.html` vs `./index.html`)

### Changes Made
1. **Updated service workers** (`service-worker.js` and `sw.js`):
   - Changed to relative paths (`./`)
   - Fixed filename to `presentation-sample.md`
   - Updated HTML reference to `./index.html`
   - Bumped cache version to `v1.0.1` to force updates

2. **Improved fetch error handling** in `index.html`:
   - Added HTTP status checking
   - Enhanced error logging
   - Better fallback to inline sample

### Why This Works
‚úÖ Relative paths work correctly on GitHub Pages at `wclaytor.github.io/projects/alpine-markdown-presentation/`
‚úÖ Cache version bump ensures browsers fetch updated service worker
‚úÖ Robust error handling provides fallback if fetch fails

The presentation now loads the sample file correctly on GitHub Pages! üéâ

[View on GitHub](https://github.com/wclaytor/wclaytor.github.io/pull/22#issuecomment-3652009548)

### Comment by @wclaytor - 2025-12-14 21:53:09

## ‚úÖ Resume Script Issue Resolved

**Problem:** The  script was generating HTML files that didn't properly render the UI features (navigation, search, theme toggle, etc.), even though it appeared to embed the resume data.

**Root Cause:** The default CONFIG object in the Python script was minimal and missing essential configuration fields required by the JavaScript template to enable UI features.

**What Was Missing:**
The original config had only:
- Basic UI settings (defaultView, sidebarTitle)
- Minimal shortView settings
- A single companyDescriptions setting

**What Was Needed:**
- Full UI feature flags (enableNav, enableSearch, enableThemeToggle, etc.)
- Complete shortView configuration with sections, earlierExperience
- Search configuration (minQueryLength, highlightMatches, fields)
- Accessibility settings (reduceMotionRespectsPreference, focusVisible, skipLink)
- Metadata fields

**The Fix:** Updated the default CONFIG in `build_resume.py` (lines 289-354) to include the complete configuration structure that matches the impressive `resume-generated-v2.html` example.

**Result:** The script now generates fully-functional resume HTML files with all UI features working correctly! ÔøΩÔøΩ

The generated output now matches the reference implementation, with only content-based differences (from the markdown source) remaining.

[View on GitHub](https://github.com/wclaytor/wclaytor.github.io/pull/22#issuecomment-3652235790)

### Comment by @wclaytor - 2025-12-14 22:14:37

## ‚úÖ Navigation Update - Home Button Moved to Nav List

**Issue Fixed:** The 'Home' button was previously a separate button in the toolbar. It has now been moved to be the first item in the navigation list.

**Changes Made to v2.3 Template:**

1. **Removed separate Home button** from desktop toolbar
2. **Removed separate Home button** from mobile toolbar
3. **Added Home link** as the first item in the navigation list (desktop)
4. **Added Home link** as the first item in the mobile drawer navigation

**Navigation Structure Now:**
- **Home** (scrolls to top)
- Links
- Summary
- Work Experience
- Education
- Skills

**How It Works:**
- The Home link calls `scrollHome()` when clicked, scrolling to the top of the page
- Maintains consistent navigation pattern with other section links
- Works on both desktop and mobile views

The generated HTML now displays navigation as requested: Home appears as the first option in the section list rather than as a separate button.

**Test:** `python projects/dynamic-resume/releases/v2.3/build_resume.py projects/dynamic-resume/releases/v2.3/william-claytor-resume.md projects/dynamic-resume/releases/v2.3/test.html`

[View on GitHub](https://github.com/wclaytor/wclaytor.github.io/pull/22#issuecomment-3652281276)

### Comment by @wclaytor - 2025-12-14 22:22:06

## ‚úÖ Navigation Cleanup - Section Type Labels Removed

**Issue Fixed:** Navigation links no longer display redundant section type labels like 'text', 'links', etc.

**Changes Made to v2.3 Template:**

1. **Removed pill labels** from desktop navigation links
2. **Removed pill labels** from mobile navigation links

**Before:**
- Home
- Links **text**
- Summary **text**
- Work Experience **text**
- Education **text**
- Skills **text**

**After:**
- Home
- Links
- Summary
- Work Experience
- Education
- Skills

**Implementation:**
Removed `<span class="pill">${sec.kind||''}</span>` from both desktop and mobile navigation rendering code. The navigation now shows clean section titles without type indicators.

**Result:** Cleaner, more professional navigation that focuses on content structure rather than implementation details.

**Test:** `python projects/dynamic-resume/releases/v2.3/build_resume.py projects/dynamic-resume/releases/v2.3/william-claytor-resume.md projects/dynamic-resume/releases/v2.3/test.html`

[View on GitHub](https://github.com/wclaytor/wclaytor.github.io/pull/22#issuecomment-3652303270)

### Comment by @wclaytor - 2025-12-14 22:46:38

## Dynamic Resume Builder v2.3 - Progress Update

All UI refinements completed and tested:

### ‚úÖ Completed Fixes
1. **Navigation restructuring** - Moved Home from separate button to first navigation item
2. **Cleaner navigation** - Removed section type labels ("text", "links") from nav pills
3. **Better view button** - Changed from "Short" to "Content: Short" / "Content: Full"
4. **Links section improvements**:
   - Removed links from page header (William Claytor section)
   - Links now display as "Label ‚Äî URL" format
   - Fixed rendering bug (changed kind from "links" to "text")

### üìÅ Files Modified
- `projects/dynamic-resume/releases/v2.3/build_resume.py`
- `projects/dynamic-resume/releases/v2.3/resume_template_configurable.html`

### üß™ Testing
Generated test files confirm all features working correctly. Links section now displays properly with the new format.

### üìã Next Steps
Potential enhancement: Add support for parsing header bullets (e.g., "US citizen willing to relocate") from markdown source.

[View on GitHub](https://github.com/wclaytor/wclaytor.github.io/pull/22#issuecomment-3652334154)

### Comment by @wclaytor - 2025-12-14 23:34:37

## Dynamic Resume Builder v2.3 - Final Update

All requested improvements completed and tested.

### Completed in This Session
1. **Links section fixed** - Changed section kind from 'links' to 'text' so template renders it properly
2. **Search functionality removed** - Per user feedback, removed search feature entirely (users can use browser Ctrl+F/Cmd+F instead)
   - Removed search input from toolbar
   - Removed applySearch() function and event listeners
   - Disabled in default CONFIG
   - Cleaner, simpler interface

### Summary of All v2.3 Improvements
- ‚úÖ Navigation: Home moved from button to first nav item
- ‚úÖ Navigation: Removed section type labels ('text', 'links')
- ‚úÖ View button: Changed to 'Content: Short' / 'Content: Full'
- ‚úÖ Links: Removed from header, display as 'Label ‚Äî URL' in section
- ‚úÖ Links: Fixed rendering bug
- ‚úÖ Search: Removed entirely for simplicity

### Files Modified
- `projects/dynamic-resume/releases/v2.3/build_resume.py`
- `projects/dynamic-resume/releases/v2.3/resume_template_configurable.html`

The resume builder is now clean, functional, and ready for use. Users can navigate sections, toggle content view, switch themes, and print/save as PDF.

[View on GitHub](https://github.com/wclaytor/wclaytor.github.io/pull/22#issuecomment-3652380154)

### Comment by @wclaytor - 2025-12-14 23:38:56

## Dynamic Resume Builder v2.3 - Final Update

All requested improvements completed and tested.

### Completed in This Session
1. **Links section fixed** - Changed section kind from 'links' to 'text' so template renders it properly
2. **Search functionality removed** - Per user feedback, removed search feature entirely (users can use browser Ctrl+F/Cmd+F instead)
   - Removed search input from toolbar
   - Removed applySearch() function and event listeners
   - Disabled in default CONFIG
   - Cleaner, simpler interface

### Summary of All v2.3 Improvements
- Navigation: Home moved from button to first nav item
- Navigation: Removed section type labels
- View button: Changed to 'Content: Short' / 'Content: Full'
- Links: Removed from header, display as 'Label ‚Äî URL' in section
- Links: Fixed rendering bug
- Search: Removed entirely for simplicity

### Files Modified
- projects/dynamic-resume/releases/v2.3/build_resume.py
- projects/dynamic-resume/releases/v2.3/resume_template_configurable.html

The resume builder is now clean, functional, and ready for use.
